pullRequest.title: [WFLY-14203] Move microprofile-config-smallrye to the microprofile feature-pack
pullRequest.bodyText:
JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-14203
Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil jmesnil@redhat.com
This PR is built on top of #13756, #13765, #13766 & #13774. Only the last commit for WFLY-14203 should be reviewed.

nodes.bodyText: @ronsigal Could you please confirm that it is fine with resteasy if this module is not present?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -47,6 +47,6 @@
         <module name="org.jboss.resteasy.resteasy-validator-provider" optional="true" services="export" export="true"/>
         <module name="org.jboss.logging"/>
         <module name="org.reactivestreams"/>
-        <module name="org.eclipse.microprofile.config.api"/>
+        <module name="org.eclipse.microprofile.config.api" optional="true"/>
